de.adesso.termacare.database.construct

Interface Repo<T extends EntityInterface,ID extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of class to use this repository for
    ID - type of id the entity has
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddressRepo, DoctorRepo, GenericRepo, MedicationRepo, PatientRepo

    interface Repo<T extends EntityInterface,ID extends java.io.Serializable>
    Interface that represents a repository connection to the database
